title: Interview: Arm SVP talks about Windows on Arm, competing with Apple, and making more powerful devices
content:
Anyone that knows me knows that if you put me in a room with someone to talk about Windows on Arm, or computing on Arm processors in general, I can talk until the sun goes down. When Arm reached out and asked if I wanted to speak toÂ Paul Williamson, its SVP and General Manager of

The post Interview: Arm SVP talks about Windows on Arm, competing with Apple, and making more powerful devices appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Arm processors are dominating the entire computing landscape, and we got to sit down with the company at MWC to talk about it.
